name: 产品测长产量
query:
SELECT
pl.for_date AS `日期:Date:150`,
pl.product_name AS `产品名称:Date:150`,
Count(pl.`name`) AS `产量:Int:80`
FROM
`tabProduct Length` AS pl
WHERE
TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(pl.for_date) <= 35 AND
pl.error_length <= 20
GROUP BY
pl.for_date,
pl.product_name
ORDER BY
pl.for_date DESC
LIMIT 100
